original_title: Sri Lanka bonds close steady, rupee 313.50/314.50 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds were steady at open, dealers said while the spot US dollar closed at 313.50/314.50 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 14.50/75 percent steady from 14.50/70 percent from opening.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 14.75/15.25 percent steady remain unchanged from opening on Tuesday.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed at 14.75/15.25 percent steady from 14.75/15.50 percent from opening on Tuesday. (Colombo/ July10/2023)
